emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Stoop 'n' Bend Garden Club members, from left, seated: Mrs. Charles Waters and Mrs. Howard Stoner; standing: Mrs. Herbert Simmons, Mrs. R.J. Johnson, Mrs. Rodney Pryor, and Mrs. Charles Adams, posed on lawn of home of Mrs. M.R. Hadley, McKeesport
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 23, 1960, pg. A9 reads: "Garden Club - Members of the Stoop 'n' Bend Garden Club were delightfully entertained last Saturday afternoon at the beautiful home of Mrs. M.R. Hadley on Jacks Run Rd., McKeesport. Mrs. Charles Waters, founder of the club in Pittsburgh, is seated left.  Mrs. Howard Stoner, a charter member, is seated right.  Standing: Mmes. Herbert Simmons, R.J. Johnson, Rodney Pryor and Charles Adams.  The group was entertained by ballet dancer Hope Tucker. - Harris photo."
